meanings.sent1: The bepimpled face made him feel self-conscious.
meanings.sent2: Her bepimpled skin cleared up after using a special cream.
meanings.sent3: The bepimpled clown made the children laugh.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was bepimpled with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The old book had a bepimpled cover from years of use.

meanings.definition: To cover or mark with pimples or blemishes.
meanings.sent1: She bepimpled her face with fake dots for the costume party.
meanings.sent2: The greasy food bepimpled his skin with acne.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous fairy decided to bepimple the frog's back.
meanings.sent4: The garden was bepimpled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The artist bepimpled the canvas with tiny dots to create a unique pattern.
